ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- cos6
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-comp7
zip_keys:
- - cdt_name
  - docker_image

about.description:
RAKE short for Rapid Automatic Keyword Extraction algorithm, is a domain independent
keyword extraction algorithm which tries to determine key phrases in a body of text
by analyzing the frequency of word appearance and its co-occurance with other words
in the text.
about.summary: RAKE short for Rapid Automatic Keyword Extraction algorithm

about.description:
RAKE short for Rapid Automatic Keyword Extraction algorithm, is a domain independent
keyword extraction algorithm which tries to determine key phrases in a body of text
by analyzing the frequency of word appearance and its co-occurance with other words
in the text.
about.summary: RAKE short for Rapid Automatic Keyword Extraction algorithm

name: rake_nltk
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "rake_nltk" %}
{% set version = "1.0.6" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/rake-nltk-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7813d680b2ce77b51cdac1757f801a87ff47682c9dbd2982aea3b66730346122

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.6,<4.0
    - pip
    - poetry
  run:
    - python >=3.6,<4.0
    - nltk >=3.6.2,<4.0.0
    - nltk_data

test:
  imports:
    - rake_nltk
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/csurfer/rake-nltk
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'RAKE short for Rapid Automatic Keyword Extraction algorithm'

  description: |
    RAKE short for Rapid Automatic Keyword Extraction algorithm, is a domain independent
    keyword extraction algorithm which tries to determine key phrases in a body of text
    by analyzing the frequency of word appearance and its co-occurance with other words
    in the text.
  dev_url: https://github.com/csurfer/rake-nltk

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - cu8blank
    - Ryan-Dmello
